metadata.name: WayruCo
metadata.description: Interactive timeline showcasing Wayru Network's journey from founding to open source transition. Features a cybernetic visualization with scroll-based milestone tracking.
metadata.author: Edward Calderon

changes: Fix footer positioning during scroll animations
Make footer sticky at bottom to prevent overlap with animation content
Improve z-index layering for better visual hierarchy
Add pointer-events-none to fixed cybernetic scene
